text: Michał Szewczyk (29 July 1934 – 8 February 2021) was a Polish actor. He acted at the and the . He was born in Łódź, Poland. He was best known for his roles in Eroica, The Two Who Stole the Moon and The Young Magician. Szewczyk died on 8 February 2021 in Łódź, Poland at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Polish movie actors Category:Actors from Łódź Category:Polish stage actors
title: Michał Szewczyk (actor)
